snippet: A new generation of fun zones blending gastronomy, a hip aesthetic and a low-key ambience have sprung up in New York City.
abstract: Mike Hale discusses and rates several outdoor destinations around New York City that offer gourmet food, laid-back shopping and seemingly spontaneous entertainment.
lead_paragraph: A new generation of fun zones blending gastronomy, a hip aesthetic and a low-key ambience have sprung up in New York City.

headline.main: Savory Lanes That Are So Not Food Courts
headline.print_headline: Savory Lanes That Are So Not Food Courts
